title: Cloudant may share aggregated usage data with partners and third parties

tosdr.case: only aggregate data is given to third parties
tosdr.tldr: Cloudant collects information to improve and maintain their services. This aggregate data doesn't identify users personally, but they may share it with their partners and other third parties. In addition, they use cookie technology to collect information from your visit to their site, such as IP addresses, Internet service provider, etc.
